Translations.Text: Tara sangi sayatana balabeh he amadera palanakarta, ami take abadhyataya lipta karini. Bastutah se nije'i chila sudura pathabhrantite lipta.
Allaha balabenah amara samane bakabitanda karo na ami to purbe'i tomaderake ayaba dbara bhaya pradarsana karechilama.
Amara kache katha radabadala haya na ebam ami bandadera prati julumakari na'i.
Yedina ami jahannamake jijnasa karaba; tumi ki purna haye gecha? Se balabeh ara'o ache ki
jannatake upasthita kara habe khodabhirudera adure.
Tomadera pratyeka anuragi o smaranakarike era'i pratisruti deya hayechila.
Ye na dekhe dayamaya allaha taâ€™alake bhaya karata ebam binita antare upasthita hata.
Tomara ete santite prabesa kara. Eta'i anantakala basabasera jan'ya prabesa karara dina.
Tara tathaya ya ca'ibe, ta'i pabe ebam amara kache rayeche ara'o adhika.
Ami tadera purbe bahu sampradayake dhbansa karechi, tara edera apeksa adhika saktisali chila ebam dese-bidese bicarana kare phirata. Tadera kona palayana sthana chila na.
Ete upadesa rayeche tara jan'ye, yara anudhabana karara mata antara rayeche. Athaba se nibista mane srabana kare.
Ami nabhomandala, bhumandala o etadubhayera madhyabarti sabakichu chayadine srsti karechi ebam amake konarupa klanti sparsa kareni.
Ata'eba, tara ya kichu bale, tajjan'ye apani chabara karuna ebam, suryodaya o suryastera purbe apanara palanakartara saprasansa pabitrata ghosana karuna.
Ratrira kichu anse tamra pabitrata ghosana karuna ebam namayera pascate'o.
Suna, ye dina eka ahabanakari nikatabarti sthana theke ahabana karabe.
Yedina manusa niscita se'i bhayabaha a'oyaja sunate pabe, sedina'i punarat'thana dibasa.
Ami jibana dana kari, mrtyu ghata'i ebam amara'i dike sakalera pratyabartana.
Yedina bhumandala bidirna haye manusa chutachuti kare bera haye asabe. Eta emana samabeta kara, ya amara jan'ye ati sahaja.
Tara ya bale, ta ami samyaka abagata achi. Apani tadera upara jorajabarakari nana. Ata'eba, ye amara sastike bhaya kare, take kora'anera madhyame upadesa dana karuna.
Kasama jhanjhabayura.
Atahpara bojha bahanakari meghera.
Atahpara mrdu calamana jalayanera
atahpara karma bantanakari pheresataganera
tomadera pradatta oyada abasya'i satya.
Inasapha abasyambhabi.
Pathabisista akasera kasama
tomara to birodhapurna katha balacha.
Ye bhrasta, se'i e theke mukha phiraya
anumanakarira dhbansa hoka
yara udasina, bhranta.
Tara jijnasa kare, keyamata kabe habe
yedina tara agnite patita habe
tomara tomadera sasti asbadana kara. Tomara eke'i tbaranbita karate ceyechila.
Khodabhirura jannate o prasrabane thakabe.
Ematabasthaya ye, tara grahana karabe ya tadera palanakarta taderake debena. Niscaya itipurbe tara chila satkarmaparayana
tara ratrira saman'ya anse'i nidra yeta
ratera sesa prahare tara ksamaprarthana karata
ebam tadera dhana-sampade prarthi o bancitera haka chila.
Bisbasakaridera jan'ye prthibite nidarsanabali rayeche
ebam tomadera nijedera madhye'o, tomara ki anudhabana karabe na
akase rayeche tomadera riyika o pratisruta sabakichu.
Nabhomandala o bhumandalera palanakartara kasama, tomadera kathabartara mata'i eta satya.
